long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official DeepDyve Plugin connects your favorite search engines with My Library in your DeepDyve account. 

- Automatically save your scholarly research queries and search results in your My Library home page.

- See which articles are available on DeepDyve, then click the plugin button to seamlessly read that full-text article through your DeepDyve account.

Search, organize, and access articles from PubMed, Google Scholar, ScienceDirect, Semantic Scholar, and across the web!
